1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Indexed value.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Index
6 ( Ix, GetIx (..),
7   Index, GetIndex (..),
8 ) where
9
10-- | Numerical index.
11type Ix = Int
12
13-- | 'Int'-indexed type.
14class GetIx a where
15    getIx :: a -> Ix
16
17-- | Numerical index.
18type Index = Int
19
20-- | 'Integer'-indexed type.
21class GetIndex a where
22    getIndex :: a -> Index
23
